import React, {useContext} from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from './components/layout/Footer' import Navbar from './components/layout/Navbar' import Container from './components/layout/Container' import Home from './components/pages/Home' import Projects from './components/pages/Projects' import NewProject from './components/pages/NewProject' import Company from './components/pages/Company' import Contact from './components/pages/Contact' import Project from './components/pages/Project' import { AuthProvider, AuthContext } from "./contexts/auth"; import LoginPage from './components/pages/Login' import Perfil from "./components/pages/Perfil"; const App = () => { const Private = ({children}) => { const {authenticated, loading} = useContext(AuthContext); if (loading){ return
loading..
; } if (!authenticated){ return ; } return children; } return ( Login } /> } />
) } export default App
